movies.title: The Prophet, the Gold and the Transylvanians
movies.plot: Two peasants from Transylvania go to America in order to meet their brother who had left Romania ten years earlier. They meet a prophet in the American state of Utah and eventually help the cause of justice in the villages where the prophet proves to be a dictator and exploiter of the coal miners over there.
movies.simplePlot: Two peasants from Transylvania go to America in order to meet their brother who had left Romania ten years earlier. They meet a prophet in the American state of Utah and eventually help the...

biography.bio: Ilarion Ciobanu was born on October 28, 1931 in Ciucur, Tighina, Romania. He was an actor, known for Michael the Brave (1970), Cu mâinile curate (1972) and Rascoala (1966). He died on September 7, 2008 in Bucharest, Romania.
biography.name: Ilarion Ciobanu

biography.bio: Ovidiu Iulian Moldovan was born on January 1, 1942 in Sarmas, Judetul Cluj, Romania. He was an actor, known for The Prophet, the Gold and the Transylvanians (1978), Horea (1984) and Pruncul, petrolul si Ardelenii (1981). He died on March 12, 2008 in Bucharest, Romania.
biography.name: Ovidiu Iulian Moldovan

biography.bio: Mircea Diaconu was born on December 24, 1949 in Vladesti, Romania. He is an actor and writer, known for Philanthropique (2002), Love Sick (2006) and Asphalt Tango (1996).
biography.name: Mircea Diaconu

biography.bio: Victor Rebengiuc was born on February 10, 1933 in Bucharest, Romania. He is an actor, known for Médaille d'honneur (2009), The Moromete Family (1987) and The Japanese Dog (2013).
biography.name: Victor Rebengiuc

biography.bio: Vasile Nitulescu was born on April 25, 1925 in Bucharest, Romania. He was an actor, known for The Mace with Three Seals (1977), The Prophet, the Gold and the Transylvanians (1978) and Tanase Scatiu (1976). He died on February 11, 1991 in Bucharest.
biography.name: Vasile Nitulescu

biography.bio: Gheorghe Visu was born on July 2, 1951 in Bucuresti, Romania. He is an actor, known for Dogs (2016), Terminus paradis (1998) and The Oak (1992).
biography.name: Gheorghe Visu

biography.bio: Zoltán Vadász was born on July 22, 1926 in Gârbou, Romania. He was an actor, known for A legnagyobb sürüség közepe (1981), Forbidden Ground (1969) and Pruncul, petrolul si Ardelenii (1981). He died on November 19, 1989 in Cluj, Romania.
biography.name: Zoltán Vadász

biography.bio: Francisc Bacs is an actor, known for The Prophet, the Gold and the Transylvanians (1978).
biography.name: Francisc Bacs

biography.bio: Olga Tudorache was born on October 11, 1929 in Oituz, Bacau, Romania. She is an actress, known for Michael the Brave (1970), An Unforgettable Summer (1994) and Drumul câinilor (1992).
biography.name: Olga Tudorache

biography.bio: Clody Bertola was born on August 12, 1913 in Bucharest, Romania. She was an actress, known for Les chardons du Baragan (1957), The Prophet, the Gold and the Transylvanians (1978) and Facerea lumii (1971). She died on December 27, 2007 in Bucharest.
biography.name: Clody Bertola

biography.bio: Mariana Mihut was born on November 7, 1942 in Bucharest, Romania. She is an actress, known for The Oak (1992), De ce trag clopotele, Mitica? (1981) and Ultima frontiera a mortii (1979).
biography.name: Mariana Mihut

biography.bio: Carmen Galin was born on March 14, 1946 in Bucharest, Romania. She is an actress, known for Zîmbet de soare (1987), Secretul lui Nemesis (1987) and Saltimbancii (1981).
biography.name: Carmen Galin

biography.bio: Ioana Ciomârtan was born on May 24, 1915 in Pitesti, Romania. She was an actress, known for Zestrea domnitei Ralu (1972), The Prophet, the Gold and the Transylvanians (1978) and Zestrea (1973). She died in 1993 in Balotesti, Romania.
biography.name: Ioana Ciomârtan

biography.bio: Andrei Codarcea was born in August 1925 in Romania. He was an actor, known for Mingea (1959), In Our Village (1951) and The Prophet, the Gold and the Transylvanians (1978). He died in January 2003 in Romania.
biography.name: Andrei Codarcea

biography.bio: Constantin Sassu was born on April 18, 1926 in Purcareni, Brasov, Romania. He was an actor, known for The Prophet, the Gold and the Transylvanians (1978), Hotel de lux (1992) and Oaspeti de seara (1976). He died on April 4, 2005 in Craiova, Dolj, Romania.
biography.name: Constantin Sassu
